Thanks Rich. I might have to repost this query again. Forgot about Jim and Gordon both being in the UK this past week. Looking at the set again yesterday, I have gained a new appreciation of it and can see why it was purchased several years ago. It certainly looks Momoyama era work and fits the bill for early f/k style as described by Gordon during his exhibit talks. If that early I would think the mei would be kind of unique to find.  

Ron
STL

  Ron -

  Nicely carved mei, but nothing in the Kinko Meikan
  close to it.

  Rich S
